mapper.sql: up_id, user_id, project_id, is_edit, is_creator, create_time, update_time, is_delete
mapper.select: select t1.up_id,t1.user_id,t2.project_id,t2.pro_name,t2.pro_version from fly_user_project t1 left join fly_project t2 on t1.project_id=t2.project_id where t1.user_id=#{userId} and t1.is_delete=0
mapper.insert: insert into fly_user_project (up_id, user_id, project_id, is_edit, is_creator, create_time, update_time, is_delete) values (#{upId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isEdit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isCreator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update fly_user_project
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_edit = #{isEdit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_creator = #{isCreator,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where up_id = #{upId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
